description.narrative: lmprove youth education development programmes by raising awareness of the role that education and transformative leadership programmes can play in developing youna leaders; contribute to the evidence base of how best to support and sustain young leaders; highlight best practices for youth leadership development; highlight how the Mastercard Foundation Scholars Program is supporting institutional change in universities, transforming them into champions who can support the education of underserved youth.

participating-org.narrative: Higher Education Web Publishing Limited (University World News)
